snippet: U.S. investigators have determined that North Korea was behind a cyber attack on Sony Corp's computers, U.S. government sources said on Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Investigators Link North Korea to Sony Hacking: Sources
headline.main: U.S. Investigators Link North Korea to Sony Hacking: Sources

lead_paragraph: U.S. investigators have determined that North Korea was behind a cyber attack on Sony Corp's computers, U.S. government sources said on Wednesday.
